meanings.definition: Consisting of all faces of a crystal being present and developed.
meanings.sent1: The holohedral crystal sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the holohedral structure of the crystal carefully.
meanings.sent3: The holohedral crystal decided to throw a party for all its faces.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as multifaceted as a holohedral crystal.
meanings.sent5: The holohedral crystal shone like a diamond in the rough.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a crystal form in which all faces are present and developed.
meanings.sent1: The holohedral structure of the crystal made it unique.
meanings.sent2: Scientists admire the beauty of holohedral crystals.
meanings.sent3: The holohedral crystal was the envy of all the other minerals.
meanings.sent4: His mind was as clear and structured as a holohedral crystal.
meanings.sent5: The holohedral crystal stood out among the rest with its perfect symmetry.
